name: Coffee Quest VR
summary: Coffee Quest is an immersive VR coffee shop simulator where you become the ultimate barista. Brew delicious espresso drinks, unlock new recipes like matcha, chai, tea, and cocoa, and perk up your café by hiring talented singers and purchasing trendy accessories and upgrades. Grind through the daily tasks of taking out the trash, washing dishes, and vacuuming the floor. Dive into the bustling world of Coffee Quest and espresso yourself in this engaging and interactive VR adventure!
